did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
University of Virginia, Student Council, Appropriations Committee
1946-1975
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 5,400 items, which are ca. 4.5 linear feet.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia, Student Council, Appropriations Committee, Accession #RG-23/2/6.791, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection is an archival transfer from the Reference Department, Alderman Library University of Virginia on 1979 September 7.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: General records of the Appropriations Committee, a standing committee of Student Council and the committee responsible for reviewing requests from student organizations for recognition as University sanctioned organizations. The records consist primarily of files on the individual organizations.
Collection is broken down into Committee files, and Files on Organizations.
